news.title: Construction equipment sales may grow 15-20% this fiscal
news.para: The industry estimates sales of construction equipment (domestic sales and exports) to grow 15-20% in fiscal 2023, compared with an 8% fall last fiscal year. Even though exports grew 60.5% to 7,802 units in FY22, local sales fell 11.4% to 77,583 units.

news.title: Trichy corporation has over Rs 100 crore property tax dues to collect annually
news.para: Since this accounts for almost half of its annual tax revenue, collecting the outstanding dues is a sure-fire way to improve its financial reserve.

news.title: Bidhannagar civic body collects Rs 4 lakh property tax on first day of doorstep drive
news.para: The civic body will hold the drive in different wards in rotation every Saturday, with special focus on the areas in Rajarhat, where tax payers will be able to clear their doubts about the tax amounts, get bills and pay the tax on spot.

news.title: Nashik civic chief wants more properties under tax net
news.para: Pawar toured the city after taking over the charge in March and learnt that some commercial establishments are not being charged the property tax.

news.title: Rajasthan housing board to sell low income group flats constructed by realtors
news.para: These apartments were constructed by private developers under the township policy and Mukhyamantri Awas Yojana.

news.title: NCR sees sharpest dip in unsold units in two years
news.para: During the same period, cities in the southern part of the country — Bengaluru, Hyderabad and Chennai — collectively saw their unsold stock increase by 32%. Other regions like MMR and Pune saw their cumulative unsold inventory reduce 10%.

news.title: Telangana SCDRC orders Aliens Group to refund 10 buyers
news.para: The real-estate firm was also told to pay Rs 50,000 as compensation for mental agony caused to the aggrieved.

news.title: Adani to acquire Holcim India assets for $10.5 billion
news.para: The Adani Group will acquire 63.1 per cent of Ambuja Cements Ltd along with related assets. Ambuja's local subsidiaries include ACC Ltd, which is also publicly traded.

news.title: Apollo makes $1 billion bet on Indian property with lending plan
news.para: That’s up from the $750 million that Apollo lent to Indian developers last year, with two-thirds of that sum directed to residential projects, according to Nipun Sahni, a partner at the private equity firm. About 70% of this year’s lending will go to home builders and the rest to commercial developers.

news.title: Pune: NGT imposes Rs 33.75 crore cost on Kumar Urban Developments
news.para: The green tribunal directed KUDPL to pay the Rs 33.75 crore environmental compensation cost and PMC to pay the Rs 2 crore to the Maharashtra Pollution Control Board (MPCB) within three months.

news.title: Runwal Group buys over 20-acre land parcel in Thane for Rs 471 crore
news.para: “The agreement for the land transfer between one of the affiliate companies of Runwal Group and PB Global was concluded a few days ago. The first part of the deal has already been registered and the rest will also be done in the next couple of weeks,” said one of the persons mentioned above.

news.title: Delhi court grants bail to ex-promoters of DHFL in multi-crore scam
news.para: Additional sessions judge Reetesh Singh, while granting bail on Friday, said: "In the present case as well, the applicant/accused — Kapil Rajesh Wadhawan and Dheeraj Rajesh Wadhawan — were not arrested during the investigation.

news.title: NDMC orders survey in all zones; seeks building plan approval, details from authorities
news.para: The North Delhi civic body also ordered the zonal commissioners to conduct a detailed survey in their areas to find out if any prohibited activity is going on in non-conforming areas to prevent the recurrence of such a tragic incident.

news.title: Proposals for 30 integrated townships, most from Pune Metropolitan Region
news.para: Of them, 12 are in the construction stage. Eight of these townhips are in the Pune region, according to the latest figures available with the town planning department.

news.title: Sundaram Home Finance's net profit up 44.9% to Rs 53.05 crore in Q4 FY22
news.para: The company clocked 44.9 per cent rise on its net profit for the quarter ending March 31, 2022 to Rs 53.05 crore from Rs 36.60 crore registered same period last financial year.
